name: Red Potion

name: Orange Potion
description: A bottle of potion made from grinded Red and Yellow Herbs.

name: Yellow Potion
description: A bottle of potion made from grinded Yellow Herbs.

name: White Potion
description: A bottle of potion made from grinded White Herbs.

name: Blue Potion
description: A bottle of potion made from grinded Blue Herbs.

name: Green Potion
description: A bottle of potion made from grinded Green Herbs Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Hallucination

name: Red Herb
description: A weak medicinal herb which heals wounds.

name: Yellow Herb
description: A valuable medicinal herb which efficiently heals wounds.

name: White Herb
description: A valuable medicinal herb which greatly heals wounds.

name: Blue Herb
description: A very valuable medicinal herb whose unique aroma gratifies one's spirit.

name: Green Herb
description: A precious medicinal herb that counteracts all poisons Cure: Poison

name: Apple
description: A round, edible fruit that, when eaten once a day, keeps the doctor away.

name: Banana
description: A sweet tasting tropical fruit made famous by its use in slapstick comedy and practical jokes.

name: Grape
description: Clustered berries with smooth skin that can be fermented to make wine.

name: Carrot
description: An orange root that is supposedly good for your vision. Despite the Beta Carotene, kids don't care much for it.

name: Potato
description: A tuber that can be fried, baked, boiled mashed, even eaten.

name: Meat
description: A leg of meat that's been cooked to near perfection.

name: Honey
description: A sweet product made by bees that is endowed with yummy flavor and medicinal uses Heal 70 ~ 100 HP. 20 ~ 40 SP

name: Milk
description: Pasteurized and bottled cow milk that is chock full of bovine goodness.

name: Hinalle Leaflet
description: Leaf cut from a Hinalle Plant which has a cool, fresh scent. It can ease pain and reinvigorate.

name: Aloe Leaflet
description: Leaf cut from an Aloe plant.

name: Mastela Fruit
description: A shiny, purple fruit picked from the boughs of the Mastela tree.

name: Holy Water
description: Blessed water used in sacred ceremonies Cure: Curse

name: Panacea
description: A mystic remedy for all illnesses Cure: Poison, Curse, Silence, Confuse, Blind, Hallucination

name: Royal Jelly
description: Highly nutritious jelly secreted from honeybees that they only feed to larvas and future queens Heal 325 ~ 405 HP. 40 ~ 60 SP. Cure: Poison, Curse, Silence, Confuse, Blind, Hallucination

name: Monster's Feed
description: Processed food that is normally fed to monsters.

name: Candy
description: A confection of sugar, chocolate and other flavorings. Kids love it!

name: Candy Cane
description: A striped cane of peppermint candy. Sugar daddies love it!

name: Apple Juice
description: Bottled apple juice that's easy to digest.

name: Banana Juice
description: Bottled banana juice that's easy to digest.

name: Grape Juice
description: Bottled grape juice that's easy to digest.

name: Carrot Juice
description: Bottled carrot juice that's easy to digest.

name: Pumpkin
description: A large orange fruit grown from a vine that's used in baking pies and a few other dishes.

name: Ice Cream
description: Deliciously frosty ice cream that can cause brain freeze if you eat too much too quickly.

name: Pet Food
description: Sterilized food that has been fortified with vitamins and minerals. Some Cute Pets will feed on this.

name: Well Baked Cookie
description: A warm, scrumptious cookie.

name: Piece of Cake
description: A sweet slice of cake covered in icing and topped with a cherry.

name: Falcon Food
description: Food intended for Falcons, but it's actually tasty enough for humans to eat.

name: PecoPeco Food
description: Food manufactured to feed Peco Pecos, but will suffice for desperately hungry humans as well.

name: Festive Cookie
description: A sweet and crunchy snack usually available during certain times in Japan.

name: Festive Rainbow Cake
description: Cake made of rice decorated in 3 colors, red, white and green.

name: Raw Fish
description: A raw, fresh fish.

name: Red Slim Potion
description: A condensed Red Potion that weighs significantly less.

name: Yellow Slim Potion
description: A condensed yellow potion that weighs significantly less.

name: White Slim Potion
description: A condensed white potion that weighs significantly less.

name: Cheese
description: A palatable food with a unique scent.

name: Yam
description: A kind of plant root used as food. It's advised to eat this slowly with water, or to bake it beforehand.

name: Rice Cake
description: A snack made out of rice that doesn't contain any fat. Some women love having this snack.

name: Sushi
description: An Eastern delicacy, in which various types of raw fish is placed on top of rice The rice is marinated in vinegar then wrapped in dried seaweed.

name: Ketupat
description: A type of food that is usually eaten by people in a country after their abstinence ceremony Heal 70 ~ 90 HP. 20 ~ 30 SP

name: Bao
description: A type of dough that is filled with ground meat, usually served hot People living in eastern countries have enjoyed eating this food for a long time.

name: Mochi
description: A tasty rice cake made for celebrating the Lunar New Year.

name: Traditional Rice Cake
description: A type of food made of rice powder. There are many recipes to make this food, all of them absolutely delicious.

name: Rice Cake Stick
description: A thin stick of rice cake which is moist and sticky.

name: Neatly Sliced Rice Cake
description: A bag of sliced rice cake. Can be cooked in various ways.

name: Chocolate
description: Fried and grinded Cacao that is solidified with Milk and cacao paste. Delicious and bittersweet Heal 1 HP. 1 SP

name: Hand-made Chocolate
description: A collection of chocolates that are gathered and arranged to make a beautiful item. This is often used in courtship and sometimes even used effectively Heal 50 HP. 50 SP

name: Handmade White Chocolate
description: White chocolate which is used to propose to a girl by a boy during White Day Heal 50 HP. 50 SP

name: White Chocolate
description: White chocolate which is used to propose to a girl by a boy during White Day Heal 50 HP. 50 SP

name: Doublecrust Swiss Fondue
description: A cheese that was put in between bread with sauces and other stuff before it was added with sweet potatoes and butter to be make into Domino Swiss Pizza It taste soft and sweet as if it melted in your mouth. This is the double layered Pizza made by Domino, the high quality pizza maker (To be sent)

name: Doublecrust Swiss Fondue
description: A cheese that was put in between bread with sauces and other stuff before it was added with sweet potatoes and butter to be make into Domino Swiss Pizza It taste soft and sweet as if it melted in your mouth. This is the double layered Pizza made by Domino, the high quality pizza maker (To be sent)

name: Rice Ball
description: A lump of rice which can be eaten for lunch.

name: Vita500
description: A delicious multi-vitamin drink. It is without caffeine and good for your health.

name: Tom Yum Goong
description: A type of soup which is regarded as one of the three famous soups in the world It has a spicy, sweet and sour taste with shrimps, lemons and chilies Heal 244 ~ 350 HP. 10 ~ 30 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Shrimp
description: A shellfish which has a long tail and many legs When cooked, the color of body changes into red and its flesh is very tasty with a unique scent.

name: Lemon
description: A bright yellow fruit with very sour juice and a fresh scent.

name: Novice Potion
description: An exclusive red potion for Novices!

name: Lucky Candy
description: A candy which is rumored to bring luck to whomever eats it.

name: Lucky Candy Cane
description: A candy cane which is rumored to bring luck to whomever eats it.

name: Lucky Cookie
description: A cookie which is rumored to bring luck to whomever eats it.

name: Chocolate Drink
description: A kind of drink made from chocolate and milk from one of the Royal Court Dessert Specialist's recipes Although the Dessert Chef wishes for people to drink this treat elegantly, it's usually gulped down, enjoyed with hand sloppily placed on the waist Heal 330 ~ 410 HP. 45 ~ 65 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Egg
description: An egg from a bird. It's full of nutrition, making it an ideal food for growing children.

name: 2nd Anniversary Cake
description: A piece of sweet cake with icing and a cherry on top. Made in celebration of Ragnarok's second anniversary.

name: Prickly Fruit
description: A freshly scented, thorny fruit from a tree Heal 150 ~ 300 HP. 20 ~ 30 SP

name: Bag of Grain
description: Dried grains that are commonly used in the cuisines of many countries.

name: Strawberry
description: A red berry that is renown for its slightly sweet and sour taste and is best eaten fresh.

name: Fresh Fish
description: A fresh fish that can be cooked in a variety of ways.

name: Bread
description: Freshly leavened bread that gives off a wholesome scent.

name: Edible Mushroom
description: An edible mushroom that can be eaten raw or cooked.

name: Orange
description: A sweet citrus fruit that can be eaten raw, juiced, or cooked as a jam Heal 10 ~ 20 HP. 10 ~ 20 SP

name: Ketupat Sayur
description: Food Eaten Slowly to replenish your body from rituals of fasting Replenish the Weakened body and give energy to protect the body Heal 325 ~ 405 HP. 40 ~ 60 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Fish Cake Soup
description: A bowl filled with hot, hearty fish broth and a generous helping of fish cake.

name: Brusti
description: A sausage with delicious smell and taste. Tastes even better if you eat it with some wheat beer.

name: Mother's Cake
description: A piece of cake filled with mother's love.

name: Red Prickly Fruit
description: A freshly scented, thorny fruit from a tree Heal 270 ~ 330 HP. 20 ~ 30 SP

name: Spaghetti
description: A noodle dish from a far nation, made from water and flour. Many tastes can be achieved using various sauces.

name: Piece of Pizza
description: A delicious snack food that is a favorite of Teenagers everywhere.

name: Pretzel
description: Looks so yummy that you will feel like to have a bite instantly.

name: Caviar Pancake
description: A pancake topped with caviar. Average people have trouble telling the difference between fine caviar and common frog spawn eggs Heal 325 ~ 405 HP. 40 ~ 60 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Jam Pancake
description: A pancake topped with strawberry jam. This looks much more delicious than plain strawberries alone Heal 325 ~ 405 HP. 40 ~ 60 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Honey Pancake
description: A very sweet pancake topped with honey Heal 325 ~ 405 HP. 40 ~ 60 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Sour-Cream Pancake
description: A pancake in which sour cream is one of the main ingredients. Biting into just once will make your eyes water Heal 325 ~ 405 HP. 40 ~ 60 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Mushroom Pancake
description: A pancake made with mushrooms that has a light taste that everyone seems to like Heal 325 ~ 405 HP. 40 ~ 60 SP. Cure: Poison, Silence, Blind, Confuse, Curse, Hallucination

name: Cute Strawberry-Choco
description: A strawberry that is supposed to be covered in a smooth layer of chocolate, but whoever made this botched it up It's not perfect, but this was made with love, if not skill.

name: Lovely Choco-Tart
description: A tart covered in a smooth layer of rich chocolate that is the perfect dessert for romantic dinners.

name: Light Red Potion
description: A red potion that has been condensed to reduce its weight and increase its effectiveness.

name: Light Orange Potion
description: An orange potion that has been condensed to reduce its weight and increase its effectiveness.

name: Fly Wing
description: The wings cut from fly to be made into enchanted item Effect: Teleport to random cell

name: Butterfly Wing
description: An enchanted butterfly's wing that instantly sends its user to his Save Point when waved in the air Effect: Teleport user to Save Point

name: Old Blue Box
description: A mysterious blue box that seems to hold something inside, but you'll have to open it to find out Effect: Gives 1 random item

name: Dead Branch
description: A twig which contains the mysterious power of eternity. It can summon a living creature Effect: Summons 1 random monster

name: Anodyne
description: A medicine made from grinded Mint that is used to ease pain and relax muscle tension. It's a popular painkiller because of its potency Effect: Casts Endure effect on user

name: Aloevera
description: A basic herbal emollient made from Aloe extract. Despite its stench and sour taste, it's addictive if regularly eaten Effect: Casts Provoke effect on user

name: Yggdrasil Berry
description: Fruit from the Yggdrasil tree which brings life to our world. Its fantastic taste is full of life.

name: Yggdrasil Seed
description: Seed from the Yggdrasil tree which holds our world together. It has a weird, energizing pungence.

name: Amulet
description: A forbidden talisman that can reanimate the dead, resulting in a walking corpse or undead zombie.

name: Yggdrasil Leaf
description: Leaf from the Yggdrasil tree which maintains the mortal coil Effect: Revive KO'ed character

name: Magnifier
description: A magnifying glass used for appraises unidentified items and equipment. Use [Ctrl + Left Click] directly on an unknown item to identify it Effect: Identifies unknown item

name: Mini Furnace
description: A disposable, miniature blast furnace that can be easily carried. Used to manufacture metals note: Only Blacksmith classes can use this.

name: Iron Hammer
description: A disposable hammer made out of well-tempered steel note: Only Blacksmith classes can use this Effect: Forges Level 1 weapon

name: Golden Hammer
description: A disposable hammer made out of pure gold note: Only Blacksmith classes can use this Effect: Forges Level 2 weapon

name: Oridecon Hammer
description: A disposable hammer made out of Oridecon note: Only Blacksmith classes can use this Effect: Forges Level 3 weapon

name: Old Card Album
description: An antique album in which the power of a mysterious Card item is contained Effect: Gives 1 random card

name: Old Purple Box
description: An old purple box holding contents that are a mystery until it is opened Effect: Gives 1 random item

name: Worn Out Scroll
description: A rolled up piece of parchment, now brittle with age, on which faded text can scarcely be read.

name: Unripe Apple
description: An apple that isn't ripe enough for humans to eat Monster: Poring

name: Orange Juice
description: A small bottle of orange juice Monster: Drops

name: Bitter Herb
description: A herb that is too bitter for the human palate Monster: Poporing

name: Rainbow Carrot
description: A fragrant carrot colored with all the hues of the rainbow Monster: Lunatic

name: Earthworm the Dude
description: A rather suave looking earthworm gifted with womanizing debonairness Monster: Picky

name: Rotten Fish
description: A rotting, dirty fish that attracts flies Monster: Chonchon

name: Rusty Iron
description: A rusty piece of iron that would only interest scavengers and vermin Monster: Steel Chonchon

name: Monster Juice
description: A fetid drink made of monster blood Monster: Hunter Fly

name: Sweet Milk
description: Sweet, luscious, full bodied milk Monster: Savage Bebe

name: Well-Dried Bone

name: Singing Flower
description: A flower that has been miraculously blessed with the gift of song Monster: Rocker

name: Dew Laden Moss
description: A dewy, green moss that grows in cool places Monster: Spore

name: Deadly Noxious Herb
description: A plant that contains poisons that would harm most living creatures Monster: Poison Spore

name: Fatty Chubby Earthworm
description: An earthworm that stopped caring about its figure years ago Monster: Pecopeco

name: Sweet Potato
description: A baked sweet potato with an appetizing scent Monster: Smokie

name: Tropical Banana
description: A premium quality banana grown in the tropics Monster: Yoyo

name: Orc Trophy
description: A trophy awarded to the bravest of Orcs Monster: Orc Warrior

name: No Recipient
description: An old, heartfelt letter that has never been delivered since it has no recipient Monster: Munak

name: Old Broom
description: A generations old broom that is handed down within a family Monster: Dokkaebi

name: Silver Knife of Chastity
description: A silver knife that is a symbol of a virgin's chastity Monster: Sohee

name: Armlet of Obedience
description: A fancy, intricately decorated bracelet Monster: Isis

name: Shining Stone
description: A stone that softly glimmers with faint light Monster: Petite

name: Contract in Shadow
description: A contract made with the realm of Darkness Monster: Deviruchi

name: Book of the Devil
description: A forbidden book in which the secret for summoning high level demons is detailed Monster: Baphomet Jr.

name: Pet Incubator
description: A portable incubator that is used to hatch Cute Pet monster eggs Effect: Hatch monster egg

name: Gift Box
description: A box that contains some sort of present Effect: Gives 1 random item

name: Concentration Potion
description: Potion that stimulates concentration. Affects the attack speed of its consumer Effect: Increases attack speed. Duration: 30 minutes

name: Awakening Potion
description: Potion that possesses the effect of awakening. It is a mysterious medicine that helps to increase the character's attack speed Effect: Increases attack speed. Duration: 30 minutes. Requirement Base level 40. All classes except Acolyte, Priest, Bard and Dancer

description: A very special potion that enrages the character and turns him into a berserker and increases the character's attack speed Effect: Increases attack speed. Duration: 30 minutes. Requirement Base level 85. Swordman, Merchant and Wizard classes; Rogue and Mage

name: Union of Tribe
description: A symbol of solidarity that evokes a feeling of nobility to those who see it Effect: Gives EXP to guild

name: Her Heart
description: An old book rumored to be enchanted by a girl whose name has been forgotten with time Monster: Bongun

name: Forbidden Red Candle
description: A candle that may have a mysterious purpose Monster: Zherlthsh

name: Soft Apron
description: A soft apron that is double stitched for better quality Monster: Alice

name: Authoritative Badge
description: A badge made out of bronze that was used in an ancient asian country It was given to government officials who went on business trips and they could use this badge to rent horses anywhere Effect: Increases movement speed. Duration: 3 minutes

name: Korean Rice Cake
description: This is a popular food in traditional Korean festivals It's made by filling a woven straw, cone shaped container with rice and then pine needles are used to cover it.

name: Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift Effect: Gives 1 random item

description: A box which contains a gift Effect: Gives 1 random item

description: A box which contains a gift Effect: Gives 1 random item

name: Gift Box
description: A box which contains a gift Effect: Gives 1 random item

description: A small red packet, seemingly containing some exciting gift, that is given by adults to children Effect: Gives some zeny

name: Tempting Rice-Cake Soup
description: A soup made with pieces of rice cake It is said that having a bowl of this soup on New Year's Day will make you one year older Young children would abuse this custom to reach legal driving age until the law was changed.

name: Bag of Gold Coins
description: A bag filled with gold coins.

name: Roulette Gold Coin
description: A coin made of gold When used, adds 1 gold point to roulette game If 10 gold points is used, Roulette will start at 3rd line.

name: Bag of Bronze Coins
description: A bag filled with bronze coins.

name: Bronze Coin
description: A coin made of bronze.

name: Mythril Coin
description: A coin made of mythril.

name: Roulette Silver Coin
description: A coin made of silver When used, add 1 silver points to roulette games If 10 silver points is used, Roulette will start at 5th line.

name: Bag of Silver Coins
description: A bag filled with silver coins.

name: Platinum Coin
description: A coin made of platinum.

name: Poison Bottle
description: A skeleton shaped bottle which contains deadly poison note: Only Assassin Cross job can use this.

name: Gold Pill
description: A herbal medicine from an old eastern country that is rumored able to cure every illness.

name: Sweet Memory of Marriage
description: A picture album of memories of the wedding ceremony or honeymoon (Married people only)

name: Herb of Incantation
description: An enchanted herb which increases magical attack strength when eaten.

name: Durian
description: A tropical delicacy known as the king of fruits. It's big, green and heavy and is covered in thorns Its odor may offend some people, but it tastes delicious Effect: ATK +10, MATK +10. Duration: 10 minutes

description: A word which means "September" in a desert country and a month of holy moon During this period, everyone goes on a fast and lead an acentic life.

description: A spell scroll which was made by the essence of ancient magic Cast: Level 3 Earth Spike

description: A spell scroll which was made by the essence of ancient magic Cast: Level 5 Soul Strike

description: A spell scroll which was made by the essence of ancient magic Cast: Level 5 Fire Ball

description: A spell scroll which was made by the essence of ancient magic Cast: Level 1 Fire Wall

description: A spell scroll which was made by the essence of ancient magic Cast: Level 5 Fire Wall

name: Level 1 Frost Diver Scroll
description: A spell scroll which was made by the essence of ancient magic Cast: Level 1 Frost Diver

name: Ora Ora
description: A trap that uses sticky, sweet scented liquid to lure and ensnare Thief Bugs. Handy if bugs are totally infesting a home.

name: Animal Gore
description: Bottled blood from a freshly slain beast. It's usually used to lure other animals.

name: Hinalle
description: A common plant with a mildly curative effect, its leaves can give a nice and smoothing sensation.

name: Aloe
description: A rare plant with curative properties that only grows deep in the forest during certain times of the year.

name: Clover
description: A plant with three heart shaped leaves that is plentiful in meadows.

name: Four Leaf Clover
description: An extremely rare clover with four leaves. Legends say that merely holding a Four Leaf Clover is a sign of great fortune to come.

name: Singing Plant
description: A mysterious plant that sings melancholic songs under a full moon. Legend says it's a woman grieving over the loss of her lover that has been reborn.

name: Ment
description: A white flower containing oils that can relieve pain and aches. Strangely, only a few remember how to use it to cause memory loss.

name: Izidor
description: A powerful hallucinogen once ground and eaten, the growing of Izidor has been prohibited because of its awesome addictiveness.

name: Illusion Flower
description: Rarely seen by humans, this flower supposedly shines brilliantly under the light of the moon.

name: Shoot
description: A delicate and fragile plant that is still in the early stages of growth.

name: Flower
description: An ordinary, thornless wildflower that doesn't have any particular scent.

name: Empty Bottle
description: An empty bottle that can be used for carrying liquid.

name: Emperium
description: Merely owning this gloriously resplendent gem is said to be a sign of being chosen by fate to wield great power.

name: Yellow Gemstone
description: An enchanted crystal that is used in conjuction with certain magic spells. Once used, it is powerless and immediately destroyed.

name: Red Gemstone
description: An enchanted crystal that is used in conjuction with certain magic spells. Once used, it is powerless and immediately destroyed.

name: Blue Gemstone
description: An enchanted crystal that is used in conjuction with certain magic spells. Once used, it is powerless and immediately destroyed.

name: Garnet
description: A dark red jewel that is the birthstone for people born in January.

name: Amethyst
description: A purple jewel that is the birthstone for people born in February.

name: Aquamarine
description: A clear, sky blue jewel that is the birthstone for people born in March.

name: Emerald
description: A brilliant, green jewel that is the birthstone for people born in May.

name: Pearl
description: A pink jewel that is the birthstone for people born in June.

name: Ruby
description: A deep maroon jewel that is the birthstone for people born in July.

name: Cursed Ruby
description: A ruby containing mysterious powers.

name: Sardonyx
description: An onyx with alternating brown and white bands of sard. It's the birthstone for people born in August.

name: Sapphire
description: A dark blue gem that is the birthstone for people born during September.

name: Opal
description: A gem displaying an array of brilliant colors that is the birthstone for people born in October.

name: Topaz
description: A golden gem that is the birthstone for people born in November.

name: Zircon
description: A dazzling white-blue gem that is the birthstone for the month of December.

name: 1carat Diamond
description: A small, twinkling and transparent gem that can be sold at a good price.

name: 2carat Diamond
description: A medium size, sparkling transparent gem that can be sold at a high price.

name: 3carat Diamond
description: A huge, dazzling gem that can be sold at an outrageous price.

name: Cracked Diamond
description: A damaged diamond with obvious imperfections that won't sell for much zeny.

name: Red Frame
description: A red frame that would make a nice present.

name: Chung Jah
description: Ancient Korean porcelain made of blue ceramic and crafted by a true master.

name: China
description: A clean, white plate crafted by a Chinese master. It's a nice present for the ladies.

name: Black Ladle
description: A black colored ladle, made out of an especially strong glowing material.

name: Pencil Case
description: A case for containing pencils. It'd be a nice gift for artists, writers, students and the like

name: Rouge
description: Make-up for rich women made of extracts from plants and animals. When applied to the skin, it shines in a lustrous, attractive red color.

name: Puppet
description: A cute cotton doll that's a favorite for little girls Can be traded for a Candy Cane if You bring this doll to <NAVI>Elin<INFO>alberta,117,135,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI> in Alberta.

name: Poring Doll
description: A doll made to resemble a Poring monster. Everyone likes it for its cuteness Can be traded for a Candy if You bring this doll to <NAVI>Elin<INFO>alberta,117,135,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI> in Alberta.

name: Chonchon Doll
description: A doll made in the image of a Chonchon monster Most people feel a little repulsed by this doll Can be traded for a Candy Cane if You bring this doll to <NAVI>Elin<INFO>alberta,117,135,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI> in Alberta.

name: Spore Doll
description: A doll that looks just like a Spore monster Can be traded for 5 Well-Baked Cookie if You bring this doll to <NAVI>Elin<INFO>alberta,117,135,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI> in Alberta.

name: Bouquet
description: A bunch of flowers that is given to express love, thanks or appreciation.

name: Wedding Bouquet
description: A small bouquet thrown by brides during the wedding ceremony. The single woman who catches it is the next to be married, supposedly.

name: Glass Bead
description: A toy for young boys that's sort of like a marble But not really.

name: Crystal Mirror
description: A gorgeous mirror made with polished crystal that is considered an essential for every woman.

name: Witherless Rose
description: A symbol of eternal love, this enchanted rose will never wither. However, it is rare and expensive.

name: Frozen Rose
description: Sculpted out of ice by masters in the Arctic, this unique and beautiful rose makes a great gift.

name: Baphomet Doll
description: A doll made to resemble Baphomet, enemy of all that is righteous. It is a dollmaker's masterpiece Can be traded for 5 Panacea if You bring this doll to <NAVI>Elin<INFO>alberta,117,135,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI> in Alberta.

name: Osiris Doll
description: A doll made to resemble Osiris, king of darkness. Without a doubt, it is a dollmaker's masterpiece Can be traded for 2 Fruit of Mastela if You bring this doll to <NAVI>Elin<INFO>alberta,117,135,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI> in Alberta.

name: Rocker Doll
description: A doll made to resemble Rocker, the grasshopper that loves to play its violin in the fields Can be traded for 7 Banana Juice if You bring this doll to <NAVI>Elin<INFO>alberta,117,135,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI> in Alberta.

name: Yoyo Doll

name: Blank Card
description: This card appears to be defective because it's blank!. The manufacturer may have forgotten to put in it's stats or it may be someone's cruel joke Bring this to the Kafra Staff in the Kafra Headquarters in Aldebaran.

name: Slotting Advertisement
description: Troy in Payon is going to do the safe slotting attempts for the price of this coupon. No Zeny, no Elunium, just this ad +the gear you are trying to slot!. Now is the time to use up all these coupons to get the gear you wanted slotted!. Come visit us in Payon as we amaze you with our Brand new service of adding a Card slot to normal equipment!. You've never seen something so amazing; Watch as Troy adds a slot with his eyes closed, it is an adventure for the whole family!. This old advertisement is from many years ago, but it does promise the best of service from the best item Socket expert the world has ever known The map on the 2nd page of the flyer looks like the shop would be north of the grain mill in Payon.

name: Knight of Honor
description: A coin which symbolizing the spirit of the pegasus knight are engraved.

name: Thorn Plant Seed
description: Be careful of the sharp thorns that surround this It is used for Geneticist Skill, Thorn Trap, Thorn Wall and Crazy weed.

name: Blood Sucker Plant Seed
description: An unpleasant seed that is used for reddish fruits, it looks as if blood is inside of it It's used for Geneticist Skill, Blood Sucker.

name: Bomb Mushroom Spore
description: A purplish spore. When it's touched a purple dust curls up that you need to be careful of It's consumed for Geneticist Skill, Spore Explosion.

name: Explosive Powder
description: A black powder that explodes when heated. It's more explosive than gunpowder.

name: Smoke Powder
description: A snow-white powder. It's so light that it stays in the air for a long time. Do not breathe it in or it can be fatal.

name: Tear Gas
description: Gas that stimulates the eyes and nose. When exposed to this gas, do not rub your eyes. Cleanse with clear water immediately if you that happens.

name: Oil Bottle
description: A bottle filled with inedible oil.

name: Mandragora Flowerpot
description: A Mandragora flowerpot used for an experiment. Fragile. Never pull out recklessly.

description: A delivery box from Dieshin Man in Morocc Ruins.

name: Eden Group Token
description: A token that certifies a member of the Eden Group. It's made to be very portable.

description: Various colors are mixed into this mysterious dye mixture Can be used to dye a Beanie, Drooping Cat, Mage Hat, or Deviruchi Hat to a different color.

description: A ball with mysterious power.

name: Shining Beads
description: Small purity beads.

name: Carnium
description: One of the hardest metals on the Rune Midgard continent. It has a extraordinary degree of strength but it's too solid to be easily refined.

name: Bradium
description: One of the hardest metals found in the Ash Vacuum It was difficult to refine because of it's high density, but recent experiments have made it possible to use it in weapon strengthening.

name: HD Carnium
description: A high density Carnium used in upgrading armor. Take this to Mighty Hammer in Eden Group or Payon next to the Kafra Shop Ladies to help you upgrade armor at +10 and higher This Carnium's density guarantees that your armor will NOT break when attempting to upgrade and if the upgrade attempt fails, it will only downgrade 1 level instead of 3 like a normal Carnium.

name: HD Bradium
description: A high density Bradium used in upgrading weapons. Take this to Mighty Hammer in Eden Group or Payon next to the Kafra Shop Ladies to help you upgrade weapons at +10 and higher This Bradium's density guarantees that your weapon will NOT break when attempting to upgrade and if the upgrade attempt fails, it will only downgrade 1 level instead of 3 like a normal Bradium.

name: HD Oridecon
description: A High Density Oridecon that has been buried deep underground Used as a material to strengthen weapons currently from refine levels 7 through 9 This item's density ensures that refine attempts will not break the weapon and if the attempt fails it will only downgrade by 1 Only a Blacksmith named Mighty Hammer can use this ore to refine.

name: HD Elunium
description: A High Density Elunium that has been buried deep underground Used as a material to strengthen armor currently from refine levels 7 through 9 This item's density ensures that refine attempts will not break the armor and if the attempt fails it will only downgrade by 1 Only a Blacksmith named Mighty Hammer can use this ore to refine.

description: A coin made from 24K pure gold issued by the Kingdom of Rune Midgard. It is used for very special purposes and also has a high collection value.

name: WPS Point Token
description: A token that can be exchanged for cash items.

name: Gun Powder

name: Black Powder
description: Matt black colored very fine powder. Be careful with it or it will blow up.

name: Yellow Powder
description: Yellow powder with no smell nor taste. Burns with blue sparks when heated.

name: White Powder
description: A salty White powder with no smell.

name: Chowder Jar
description: A jar which contain a mixed chowder.

name: Savage Meat

name: Cooking Skewer

name: Cold Ice

name: Beef Head

name: Ice Piece
description: A fragment of ice made when it's crushed.

name: Ice Crystal

description: The most common fruit on Comodo island. It has a sour and sweet flavor unlike it's shape.

name: Petite's Tail
description: Tail of Petite. It'll grow again when it's cut.

name: Fine Noodle
description: White and thin noodle. It's a summer delicacy.

name: Cool Gravy
description: A basic ingredient of cooking. It requires hours of boiling to make it. It's essential especially for noodles.

name: Coconut Fruit
description: Fruit of coconut tree. It contains fruit juice within.

name: Melon
description: Round and green net patterned fruit. It has a sweet smell.

name: Pineapple
description: A fruit with a sour and sweet flavor. The peel of the fruit is tough but the fruit inside is delicious.

name: Key of Deception
description: A Key which is nicknamed "Deception". You're not sure what this key is for.

name: Key of Illusion
description: A Key which nicknamed "Illusion". You're not sure what this key is for.

name: Key of Pleasure
description: A Key which nicknamed "Pleasure". You're not sure what this key is for.

name: Master's Brush
description: A legendary brush which is used by a Master of dark arts. People says it's made of the best ivory and hair of a god.

name: Picture of Maestro Song
description: A picture of Maestro Song that was taken in front of Thanatos tower. Written on the back is "I want to have a Teddy Bear. I need 33?".

name: Receipt
description: A receipt from a shop in Juno. There's a signature which looks like it was signed by Maestro Song".

name: Seed For Experiemnt
description: A seed of a plant which is widely used for experiments that grows fast and is easy to modify.

name: Seed For Experiemnt
description: An altered seed which is influenced by external factors. Nobody knows what kind of plant will bloom from it.

name: Saint's Clothing Piece
description: Traces of a cloth which has been worn by a Saint.

name: King's Shield
description: A Cross shield which is said to have been used by King Schmitz. It's so old and shabby that it seems impossible to use.

name: Clear Reagent
description: A transparent reagent without any impurities.

name: Red Reagent
description: A red colored reagent.

name: Black Reagent
description: A black colored reagent.

name: How To Make An Apple Bomb
description: List of ingredients required to make an Apple bomb Material 1 Apple. 1 Scell. 1 Gun Powder. 1 Detonator.

name: How To Make A Pineapple Bomb
description: List of ingredients required to make a Pineapple bomb Material 1 Pineapple. 1 Cactus Needle. 3 Gun Powder. 1 Detonator.

name: How To Make A Coconut Fruit Bomb
description: List of ingredients required to make a Coconut bomb Material 1 Coconut. 2 Gun Powder. 1 Detonator.

name: How To Make A Melon Bomb
description: List of ingredients required to make a Melon bomb Material 1 Melon. 1 Sticky Mucus. 2 Gun Powder. 1 Detonator.

name: How To Make A Banana Bomb
description: List of ingredients required to make a Banana bomb Material 1 Banana. 1 Mould Powder. 4 Gun Powder. 1 Detonator.

name: How To Grow Plant Genes
description: Thorn seed, vampire seed, bomb shaped mushroom plant cultivation Thorn Seed: Thorn fruit 10. Vampire seed: ManEater Plant root 10. Bomb mushroom spore: mushroom spore 10, Poison mushroom spore 5, Gun Powder.

name: How To Make High Quality Potion
description: This is the manual book for producing Enrich White PotionZ, vitata500, Enriched cell juice and Cure Free Enriched White PotionZ: Empty Test Tube 10 + White potion 20 + White herb 10 + Alcohol 1 . Vitata500: Empty Test Tube 10 + Grape 10 + Honey 10 + Blue Herb 10. Enrich Celermine Juice: Empty Test Tube 10 + Awakening Potion 5 + Concentration Potion 5 + Spicy Sauce 5. Cure Free: Empty Test Tube 10 + Panacea 5 + Green Herbs 20 + Mastela Fruit 1 + Yggdrasil Leaf 1.

name: Gym Pass
description: A Gym Pass that can be given to a special NPC to learn a skill that will increase your Maximum Weight Capacity by 200 for each skill level This special skill can only be learned up to Level 10.

name: Omni Clothing Dye
description: If you give this coupon to the Stylist Dinorah Lacostt at Prontera or Eden Group Headquarters, she will dye your costume to 1 of 3 different color variations.

name: Summer Happy Box
description: The joyful color of yellow makes you feel strangely happy. Every time you think about opening it you resist the temptation. Perhaps a professional Gift Opener could be of assistance You seem to recall seeing such a gal at Prontera 164 110. Payon 162 124. Aldebaran 124 114. Juno 179 187

name: Mysterious Dyestuff

name: Enriched Elunium

name: Enriched Oridecon

name: Token of Siegfried
description: A certificate imbued with the power of the invulnerable Siegfried which allows its bearer to overcome death Revives the dead character.

It seems that it becomes more difficult for weapon upgrade When you fail while upgrading defense weapon whose refine level is over +10, it won't be destroyed (When the upgrade fails, refine level gets -1). <NAVI>Basta<INFO>itemmall,25,71,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI>

Chocolate is made by solidying the cacao paste with milk. The fat extracted from the cacao paste is used as cacao butter, so it's not ready to eat yet.

I beg you, come and see me tonight where we first met I'll be waiting for you --K.H. August 19th"

name: James's Note

"Dearest Allysia, Believe me, I was just as surprised to learn that my family engaged me to Ms. Cerinee I'm sorry I hurt you, but I've decided that you are the one I want Meet me tomorrow night and we'll run away so that we can finally be together, my love --James, August 19th".

name: Travel Brochure [Amatsu]
description: [Amatsu the Land of Destiny]. The people of Amatsu carry themselves with honor and tranquility During your visit you should see the Beautiful Water Shrine. The Lord of Amatsu is much more open. than rulers in other lands, they will talk to visitors and citizens alike The Legendary Tree in Amatsu has many legends about it, such as the Legend that when you propose under. its branches your marriage will be blessed While in Amatsu you should see the Coy Pond, nobility of Amatsu keep wonderful gardens or plants, sand and rocks Their careful balance and flow reflect the keeper's state of mind Part of garden is a Coy Pond, these frolicsome fish are a delight to all [Don't forget to take photos of all these things and show them to your Tour Guide.]

name: Travel Brochure [Kunlun]
description: [Kunlun The Hermit Land]. Kunlun is a land in the clouds Being so high in the air affords an unprecedented view of the world, it also gives. a different mindset to those whom allow themselves to think freely The Statue of Kunlun's Greatest Philosopher, stands proudly in the middle of town, ready to. inspire great thoughts from all those that gaze upon him. All around Kunlun are spectacular Overlooks of the World But there are particular spots that are exceptionally breathtaking, please watch your step There is a small hill in Kunlun that is said to of been the Great Philosophers favorite meditation spot,. you should visit there and see if any grand thoughts take you No matter how great a culture is, there will always be a few among its citizenry that just don't 'get it' Those in Kunlun's history that always thought small eventually truly shrank and eventually disappeared But before that time they had a Mini-town that they lived in on ground beneath Kunlun That place is an object lesson against stagnant thinking [Don't forget to take photos of all these things and show them to your Tour Guide.]

name: Travel Brochure [Louyang]
description: [Louyang]. Louyang is a spiritual country, where the warrior spirit and clear thinking are highly prized Such wondrous sites such as the Statue of the Man and the Tiger may inspire you to do your best Louyang has a different perspective on healing the mind and the body. While Rune-Midgard relies on the science of potions,. and Faith for healing, the Louyang healers practice their art at a "Hospital" At a Hospital, your body will be cured by a system of body manipulations and diet The beautiful Palace that is protected by the Great Wall of Louyang is truly a sight to behold for every visitor To go along with their proud heritage of Martial Arts and spirit training, they often practice making their bodies. more robust through exercise. Some of these exercises target the legs others the Lungs Outside Louyang some practice their Shouting on the Tower. If you have seen all these sites in Louyang,. you will have quite a few good memories to take home [Don't forget to take photos of all these things and show them to your Tour Guide.]

name: Travel Brochure [Ayothaya]
description: [Ayothaya]. Thoughts of transcending your limitations and finding Life's perfect philosophy is Ayothaya's Heritage In Ayothaya's history is great Philosopher that all Ayothayans seek to emulate There are numerous statues representing this Philosopher exist in and around Ayothaya You should visit them to see what differences and significance these Reclining Philosopher Statues mean to you Part of the Philosophy involves many hours of meditation a day to keep balance in your mind and body You should visit the Shrine in Ayothaya and meditate upon your life's journey And when you complete your regimen of Exercise and Introspection you can refuel your body by visiting. the Tom Yum Goong restaurant. The famous soup made here is truly delicious Don't leave Ayothaya without sampling the dishes there [Don't forget to take photos of all these things and show them to your Tour Guide.]

name: Oblivion Curse

name: Death Hurt
description: A poison that pollutes a wound When a target is caught by this poison for 300 seconds, recovery skills decrease in effect by 20% The poison is extra potent if also inflicted by Critical Wound.

name: Toxin
description: A poison that numbs nerves It continues for 300 seconds and generates damage every 3 seconds. This ignores the weapons or card options which don't disconnect spell.

name: Pyrexia
description: A poison that causes a feverish state For 300 seconds, it spells darkness that can't be removed and causes hallucination. Gets 100 damages for one second and while getting damages if casting was ongoing, the casting also can be cancelled.

name: Magic Mushroom
description: A poison that has the effect of a laughing mushroom For 300 seconds, one loses 3% of HP for every 4 seconds and casts random skills.

name: Venom Bleed
description: A poison that reduces physical strength MaxHP decreases by 15% for 15 seconds.

name: Nosiege Runestone
description: Casts "Refresh", removing all abnormal states and debuffs and prevents any abnormal state or debuff effects for 30 seconds Recover 25% HP and can be used while stunned, frozen or deep sleep Must wait 5 minutes to reuse Maximum carrying amount: 10

name: Rhydo Runestone
description: Casts "Crushing Strike", destroying equipped weapons while drawing out all of its power to strike a strong blow to your target Must wait 1 minute to reuse Maximum carrying amount: 10

name: Verkana Runestone
description: Casts "Millennium Shield", randomly summoning 2~4 magic shields This shield has the same DEF and MDEF as the person casting and has 1000 HP Must wait 1 minute and 30 seconds before reusing Maximum carrying amount: 10

name: Isia Runestone
description: Casts "Vitality Activation", maximizing your health for one minute. HP recovery potion effect increases one and half times But, it generates instability of mind so SP does not naturally recover while active and the effect of SP recovery potion decreases to half Waiting time for reuse: None Maximum carrying amount: 2

name: Asir Runestone

This effect is better when Rune Mastery level is higher Waiting time for reuse: None Maximum carrying amount: 20

name: Pile of Small Bones
description: A pile of small animal bones There is small collar with bell between the bones.

name: Mix Juice Pack
description: A package containing a mix of juice.

name: Purple ore
description: An ore that radiates strange light. It's flowed with magic.

name: Purple Ore Box
description: A box full of purple ores.

name: Buffalo Bandit Mane
description: A buffalo mane of Albert Ford. Used as evidence of negotiation.

name: Rockridge Coin
description: Common currency in Rockridge Village. It can be used to buy goods from Rock Ridge.

name: Fermented Grape Juice
description: Well fermented and sweet smelling grape juice.

name: Holly Sprig
description: A sprig of Holly tree Will be deleted after the event ends.

name: Box of Sugar
description: A box of sugar to be delivered to valerie Will be deleted after the event ends.

name: Firewood
description: Parched tree branches Will be deleted after the event ends.

name: Hazy Dream Fragment
description: A fragment of crystallized spiritual imprint. It works like a mirror, reflecting the image of a lost memory.

name: Bloody Love Letter
description: The names of its sender and recipient are smudged beyond recognition. "You left in the dead of winter with a promise to come back in the next spring. Flowers have bloomed and withered and you are still not here. Dear Moon, please send my regards to my beloved.".

name: Broken Arrow
description: An arrow found from soldiers who died fighting for their village. It radiates with negative energy.

name: Recruitment Leaflet
description: Used for recruiting members of a monster subjugation party. "There's a settlement full of deceptive foxes and other wicked monsters in the middle of a mountain ".

name: Purple Ore Fragment
description: A fragment of purple ore It's flowed with magic.

name: Torn Paper
description: An old piece of paper that is filled with writing It's believed to be torn of an old journal. "My name is I'm writing this in an effort to remember myself I'm a mage of Geffen " Can be sold to Collection Merchants

name: Well-dried Clover
description: A carefully dried four-leaf clover It's believed to bring good luck to its bearer It has a message written on it in small letters, "You need this more than I do." Can be sold to Collection Merchants

name: Short Bat Hair
description: Short, stiff hair that is so dark that it absorbs light instead of reflecting it Capes made with this hair are popular among people with secretive, unsavory jobs Can be sold to Collection Merchants

name: Cluster of Nightmares
description: A cluster of nightmares that causes you to wake up sweating and panting Can be sold to Collection Merchants

name: Shining Spore
description: Glowing mushroom spores. They grow into mushrooms that illuminate dark caves Can be sold to Collection Merchants

name: Dried Yggdrasil Leaf
description: An old dry Yggdrasil leaf that is partially used. It's cut into tiny pieces Can be sold to Collection Merchants

name: Suspicious Pentacle
description: A creepy-looking magic scroll. It has a pentacle drawn in red paint and has a faint, unpleasant odor Can be sold to Collection Merchants

name: Sticky Blood
description: Sticky blood that is sustained with the vicious energy of tombs. It's highly toxic and thus requires careful handling

name: Mushroom Sap
description: Sap from mushrooms that grow in extreme conditions. Used for making detoxifying and diluent medicines

name: Wavy Mane
description: A lock of mane that waves like dancing flames. Rumor has it that this mane lets those who gaze upon it peek into someone else's dream

name: Illusion Stone
description: A mysterious ore that is rarely can be found. Rumor has it that this clear ore lets those who gaze into it experience lifelike illusions Only the wisest can see the true value of this ore.

name: Illusion Gemstone
description: A mysterious ore that is rarely found. Looking at this ore, I can't help but wonder how valuable it is and if there's someone I could talk to about its value.

name: Clean Bone
description: A small bone A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Poisonous Powder
description: A powder with high toxic level A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Robber Scarf
description: A red scarf wore by wild west robber A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Crude Ammo
description: An ammunition that is illegally produced A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Broken Shotgun
description: Just a broken shotgun A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Crude Scimitar
description: A rusty old scimitar. It seems may break at any moment A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Old Revolver
description: A rusty old revolver A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Brown Scarf
description: A brown colored scarf. A necessity for a night watch A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Swamp Bug Shell
description: A Bark of Marsh Worm A collectible that can be sold to merchant.

name: Brown Rat Tail
description: A tail of brown rat A collectible that can be sold to merchant.
